text:
Company: Huerta, Rivera and Gibson
Role: Financial Specialist

Company Background:
Huerta, Rivera and Gibson is a renowned financial services firm with a strong emphasis on diversity and inclusivity. We offer a dynamic work environment that supports professional growth and fosters a culture of mutual respect and collaboration.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description and Responsibilities:
We are seeking a dedicated Financial Specialist to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for:
- Conducting financial analyses and reporting to support business decisions.
- Managing client portfolios and providing tailored financial advice.
- Assisting in the preparation of financial statements and budgets.
- Ensuring compliance with all regulatory requirements.
- Collaborating with team members to develop financial strategies.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field.
- Minimum of three years of experience in financial analysis or a similar role.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Proficiency with financial software and tools.
- Excellent communication skills and a commitment to ethical standards.
- Ability to work calmly under pressure and meet deadlines.

Perks and Benefits:
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Generous paid time off and holiday schedules.
- Opportunities for professional development and continuing education.
- Retirement savings plan with company matching.
- A supportive work environment that values work-life balance.
- Transparent and equitable salary practices, ranging from USD 60,000 to USD 80,000 based on experience and skills.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume and a cover letter explaining your interest in the role and how your background aligns with our company values.

Equal Opportunity Employer:
Huerta, Rivera and Gibson is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We welcome applications from candidates of all backgrounds and experiences.
